headline: Cramer Stands Firm on American Electric Power Despite Target Cuts and Debt Issue
summary: American Electric Power Company, Inc. (NASDAQ:AEP) is one of the Jim Cramer’s Recession-Proof Stock Picks. Amid lowered price targets and issuance of $2 billion in debentures, Jim Cramer is not backing down on the stock. On August 29, 2025, the West Virginia Public Service Commission (PSC) approved the securitization of $2.4 billion in costs and […]
